title: Dzul Dance Soul of the Maya
desc: Soul of the Maya explores ancient Mayan beliefs regarding the soul.?This highly visual and physical performance illuminates the journey of the soul and the cycle of life, death and reincarnation. Artistic Director Javier Dzul and his diverse company of performers have been presented throughout the world garnering reviews that hail Dzul's "acrobatic wizardry" ( Attitude: The Dancers' Magazine ) and his ability to turn his dancers of "remarkable elasticity" into creatures of the air as well as of the earth." ( The New York Times ). Dzul's dancing has been described as "mythical" by City Arts, "electrifying" by Magazine Art and "spellbinding" by  The Scotsman .
